audio_item.dc.title: Sound Recording - Traffic Courts - 1950 May 21
audio_item.dc.contributor.author: Cushing, George

audio_item.dc.description: Content note: The sound recording(s) associated with this repository item derive from a single audio reel tape. A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Side 1] : [Part 1] : In Our Opinion radio program featuring guests: Judge Geo. T. Murphy (Detroit Traffic Judge), Judge John D. Watts (Detroit Traffic Judge), Judge Paul Younger (Lansing-Head of the Municipal Judges Ass. of Mich.), Judge Henry Hart (Midland), Emmet Robinson (Justice of the Peace from Bridgeport, Mich.).
